title: Google\Cloud\Domains\V1beta1\ConfigureManagementSettingsRequest
name: ConfigureManagementSettingsRequest
description:
Request for the ConfigureManagementSettings method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.domains.v1beta1.ConfigureManagementSettingsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.registration
params.description: Required. The name of the Registration whose management settings are being updated, in the format projects/*/locations/*/registrations/*.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Required. The field mask describing which fields to update as a comma-separated list. For example, if only the transfer lock is being updated, the update_mask is "transfer_lock_state".
